effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is poisoned, this move has double power.

short_effect.sword_shield: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid. This move’s power is doubled if the target is poisoned.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user drenches the target in a special poisonous liquid to inflict damage. This move’s power is doubled if the target has a status condition.
